title: Bran Black: Meet the new CEO of the Business Council of Australia
snippet: As the pick to succeed Jennifer Westacott as the head of the Business Council of Australia, congenial political staffer and former lawyer Bran Black lacked instant name recognition.

title: Statement by Business Council chief executive Jennifer Westacott - Business Council of Australia
snippet: Mr Gailey was greatly respected for his deep and thoughtful contribution to public policy development in Australia, working closely with former Business Council CEO Katie Lahey during his time as President.

title: Appointment of New Business Council of Australia President | Treasury Ministers
snippet: The Government looks forward to the BCA’s ongoing contribution to policy debate under the leadership of both Mr Reed and CEO, Jennifer Westacott.

title: How the Business Council of Australia lost its mojo
snippet: BCA CEO Bran Black and president Geoff Culbert, former CEO Jennifer Westacott and former president Tim Reed.

title: Board - Business Council of Australia - V1
snippet: President, Business Council of Australia · Chief Executive Officer, Commonwealth Bank of Australia (CBA)
